title: 4 people dead, one hospitalized in domestic shooting
content:
(WCYB) Washington County Sheriff Fred Newman has confirmed four people are dead and one person is hospitalized after a shooting Tuesday morning on Graceland Lane in Glade Spring, Va.
WCYB reported this morning that investigators confirmed the shooter is among those killed during an ongoing domestic dispute.
Officials haven't released the names of the people involved.
A man forced his way into the home of his wife's parents and opened fire, starting a struggle in the home, reported WCYB.
One of the victims was seen running to nearby homes trying to get help.
WCYB told the suspect was armed with several guns.
